string-array.name: change_phone_info
string-array.item: ● Connect this phone to PC and open files folder;
● Copy backup file in phone to PC;
● Connect new phone to PC and open files folder;
● Copy backup file to new phone;
● Launch “Backup and Restore”App in new phone and select the target files to restore.

string-array.name: sdcard_unmount_backup
string-array.item: Transfer data via SD card:
● Insert SD card in this phone;
● Backup data;
● Plug out SD card and insert in new phone;
● Launch “Backup and Restore”App in new phone and select the target files to restore.
Transfer data via PC:
● Backup data in this phone;
● Connect this phone to PC and open files folder;
● Copy the target backed up files from this phone to PC;
● Connect the new phone to PC and open files folder;
● Copy backed up files to new phone;
● Launch“Backup and Restore”App in new phone and select the target files to restore.

string-array.name: change_phone_info_dialog
string-array.item: @string/no_more_notice

string-array.name: no_sdcard_restore_info
string-array.item: ● Connect the old phone to PC and open files folder;
● Copy the target backup files in phone or sdcard folder to PC;
● Connect this phone to PC and open files folder;
● Copy backup file to this phone;
● Launch “Backup and Restore”App in this phone and select the target files to restore.

string-array.name: sdcard_unmount_restore_info
string-array.item: Transfer data via SD card:
● Insert SD card in old phone (Ignore ths step if there is already SD card in old phone);
● Backup data in old phone;
● Plug out SD card and insert in this phone;
● Select the target file to restore in this device.
Transfer data via PC:
● Connect the old phone to PC and open files folder;
● Copy the target backup files in phone or sdcard folder to PC;
● Connect this phone to PC and open files folder;
● Copy backup file to this phone;
● Launch “Backup and Restore”App in this phone and select the target files to restore.
